analysisEngineMetaData.name: Gazetteer FPLX HGNC Group Dictionary
analysisEngineMetaData.description: This is a minimal template for the use with the JCoRe component using the Lingpipe Gazetteer Chunker. It must be set which exact annotation type should be created for recognized dictionary entries and a chunker configuration must be provided as an external resource and bound to the 'DictionaryChunkerProvider' resource dependency. In this descriptor, the external resource is configurable. That is, it points directly to the dictionary file and has a set of parameters for dictionary processing and tagging directly embedded into the descriptor. The current parameter settings will work but may be changed. Refer to https://github.com/JULIELab/jcore-base/tree/master/jcore-lingpipegazetteer-ae for more information.

configurationParameter.name: CheckAcronyms
configurationParameter.description: Checks whether an acronym match in dictionary has a respective full form with the same label (=specificType). If a matched text passage is an acronym but the long form is not a ConceptMention (or a sub type) with the same specificType value, the original match will be rejected.

configurationParameter.name: OutputType
configurationParameter.description: The UIMA annotation type that should be generated for text passages matching a dictionary entry. The given type must be a sub type of de.julielab.jules.types.ConceptMention. The label given for the dictionary entry will be used for the annotation's 'specific type' feature.

externalResourceDependency.description: An implementation providing the actual Lingpipe Chunker class for dictionary tagging.

externalResource.name: FamPlex productive
externalResource.description: Employs the configurable alternative chunker implementation. This alternative implementation is primarily meant for approximate matching and should be used in this intent. It offers text normalization for better dictionary matching and the removal of accents (transliteration). It is configured in the component descriptor and directly references the dictionary URL.

analysisEngineMetaData.name: GePi Famplex ID Assigner
analysisEngineMetaData.description: Expects GNormPlus or ProGene-style gene annotations and Gazetteer annotations with Neo4j tid concept IDs. Then, for family gene annotations overlapping with gazetteer annotations, the tid of the gazetteer annotation will be transferred as a resource entry to the family gene.

analysisEngineMetaData.name: JCoRe Likelihood Detection AE
analysisEngineMetaData.description: Analysis Engine to detect epistemic modal expressions and assign the appropriate likelihood category.

configurationParameter.name: LikelihoodDict
configurationParameter.description: String parameter indicating path to likelihood dictionary (One entry per line; Entries consist of tab-separated lemmatized likelihood indicators and assigned likelihood category)

analysisEngineMetaData.name: JCoRe Likelihood Assignment AE
analysisEngineMetaData.description: Analysis Engine to assign likelihood indicators to their corresponding entities and events.

configurationParameter.name: ConsistencyAnno
configurationParameter.description: set true if AcronymAnnotator should annotate every occurence of shortforms in the text

configurationParameter.name: MaxLength
configurationParameter.description: Define how far (how many words, ignoring stopwords) the AE is supposed too look for the beginning of the fullform.

configurationParameter.name: Postprocessing
configurationParameter.description: Activates a post processing that unifies overlapping abbreviations and fullforms.
